DOC.brief_summary: This study intends to see the effect of nafamostat on the attenuation of postreperfusion syndrome (PRS) that frequently occurs during liver transplantation.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Nafamostat on Postreperfusion Syndrome (PRS)
DOC.criteria: >= 18 year old scheduled to undergo liver transplantation Previous history of pulmonary, cardiovascular, or renal disease Previous history of allergic reactions to nafamostat
